org.apache.beam.sdk.util

Class BaseExecutionContext.StepContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.util.BaseExecutionContext.StepContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionContext.StepContext
    Enclosing class:
    BaseExecutionContext<T extends ExecutionContext.StepContext>

    public abstract static class BaseExecutionContext.StepContext
extends Object
implements ExecutionContext.StepContext
    Base class for implementations of ExecutionContext.StepContext.

    To complete a concrete subclass, implement timerInternals() and stateInternals().
